com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.ui

Interface PanelBorder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoundedLineBorder

    public interface PanelBorder
    Borders implementing this interface should provide good quality when drawing non-linear borders. Together with BorderedPanel allows good rounded borders.
    Author:
    tilastokeskus
    See Also:
    BorderedPanel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Area getBorderBounds(Component c)
      Returns the bounding area of the borders.
      void paintBorder(Component c, Graphics g)
      Paints a border on the given graphics according to the given component.

    • Method Detail

      • paintBorder

        void paintBorder(Component c,
               Graphics g)
        Paints a border on the given graphics according to the given component.
        Parameters:
        c - component according to which the border should be drawn.
        g - graphics object where the borders should be drawn.

      • getBorderBounds

        Area getBorderBounds(Component c)
        Returns the bounding area of the borders.
        Parameters:
        c - component according to which the bounds should be determined.
        Returns:
        the area that the borders enclose.
